text: @realDonaldTrump Record #unemployment numbers, almost 110,000 dead & 2 million infected from the #coronavirus, protests happening in over half the country, canceled #ChinaTradeDeal, States are broke, the Fed is broke, & the #StockMarket isn't the #economy. As a businessman you should know that.
